2015.query: Globant competitors 2015 IT services digital transformation
2015.context: Globant S.A. is a digital transformation and technology services company focused on software development, digital experience, and AI transformation. IPO. Digital studios model for specialized expertise.

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Founded in 1989, headquartered in Dublin, Ireland. Professional services company with 800,000+ employees across 120+ countries offering strategy, consulting, operations, digital transformation, cloud computing, and cybersecurity. Generates 2,788% the revenue of Globant.

competitors.name: Thoughtworks
competitors.notes: Founded in 1993, based in Chicago, Illinois. Technology consultancy specializing in custom software development and technology innovation, with services in digital transformation, data and AI integration, adaptable technology platforms, and digital product design.

competitors.name: EPAM Systems
competitors.notes: Founded in 1993, based in Newtown, Pennsylvania. Public company providing digital engineering, cloud transformation, and AI-enabled services across various industries. One of Globant's top competitors in the IT Services industry.

competitors.name: GlobalLogic
competitors.notes: Digital product engineering company providing services including product strategy, user experience design, and digital business transformation.

competitors.name: Virtusa
competitors.notes: Founded in 1996, based in Southborough, Massachusetts. Provides digital engineering and technology services, offering problem-solving and execution of technology ideas to address business challenges.

competitors.name: SoftServe
competitors.notes: IT services and consulting company competing in digital transformation space.

competitors.name: Perficient
competitors.notes: Digital consultancy providing technology consulting and solutions.

competitors.name: Wipro
competitors.notes: Global IT services and consulting company.

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Global leader in consulting, technology, and outsourcing services.

competitors.name: Cognizant
competitors.notes: Major player in digital transformation offering IT consulting, technology services, and digital solutions.

competitors.name: Endava
competitors.notes: IT services company focusing on digital transformation.

2020.context: Globant S.A. is a digital transformation and technology services company focused on software development, digital experience, and AI transformation. Digital transformation demand surge. Acquired multiple agencies.

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Top competitor. Professional services company headquartered in Dublin, Ireland with 800,000+ employees across 120+ countries. Offers comprehensive services in digital transformation, cloud computing, cybersecurity, strategy, consulting, and operations.

competitors.name: Thoughtworks
competitors.notes: Technology consultancy specializing in custom software development and technology innovation. Founded in 1993, based in Chicago, Illinois. Offers digital transformation services including data and AI integration, adaptable technology platforms, and digital product design.

competitors.name: EPAM Systems
competitors.notes: One of Globant's top competitors. Public company founded in Newtown, Pennsylvania in 1993. Works within the IT Services industry with 28,198 more employees than Globant. Provides digital engineering and AI-enabled services.

competitors.notes: IT services and digital transformation company.

competitors.notes: Digital consultancy and technology services provider.

competitors.notes: Digital product engineering and business transformation services company.

competitors.notes: Global IT services and consulting firm.

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Top competitor. Global leader in consulting, technology, and outsourcing services.

competitors.notes: IT consulting, technology services, and digital solutions provider.

competitors.notes: IT services company focused on digital transformation.

competitors.name: Virtusa
competitors.notes: Founded in 1996, based in Southborough, Massachusetts. Provides digital engineering and technology services for business challenges.

competitors.name: UST
competitors.notes: Listed as one of Globant's top competitors in digital services.

competitors.name: Happiest Minds

2024.context: Globant S.A. is a digital transformation and technology services company focused on software development, digital experience, and AI transformation. AI-powered reinvention services. Global delivery network.

competitors.name: Accenture
competitors.notes: Top competitor and most similar to Globant. Founded in 1989, Dublin-based professional services giant with 800,000+ employees across 120+ countries. Generates 2,788% the revenue of Globant. Offers comprehensive services in digital transformation, cloud computing, cybersecurity, strategy, and consulting.

competitors.name: Thoughtworks
competitors.notes: Established in 1993 with around 10,500 'Thoughtworkers' across 19 countries including Latin America and Asia. Provides software engineering, digital product development, consulting, and advisory services.

competitors.name: EPAM Systems
competitors.notes: One of Globant's top competitors. Public company founded in Newtown, Pennsylvania in 1993 in the IT Services industry. Major player in digital transformation and technology services.

competitors.name: Cognizant
competitors.notes: Major player in digital transformation offering IT consulting, technology services, and digital solutions. Focus on innovation and customer-centricity with cutting-edge solutions.

competitors.name: Infosys
competitors.notes: Top competitor. Global leader in consulting, technology, and outsourcing services with strong focus on digital transformation and innovation. Known for delivering high-quality solutions.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Multinational technology company offering cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and digital transformation services. Strong focus on innovation and technology across industries.

competitors.name: SoftServe
competitors.notes: IT services and digital transformation company competing in similar markets.

competitors.name: Perficient
competitors.notes: Digital consultancy and technology services provider.

competitors.name: GlobalLogic
competitors.notes: Digital product engineering and transformation services company.

competitors.name: Wipro
competitors.notes: Global IT services and consulting competitor.

competitors.name: Endava
competitors.notes: IT services company focused on digital transformation.

competitors.name: UST
competitors.notes: Listed as one of Globant's top competitors.

competitors.name: Happiest Minds
competitors.notes: Digital transformation and IT services competitor.

competitors.name: BairesDev
competitors.notes: Prominent outsourcing partner and chief Globant competitor. Offers flexible models including staff augmentation, dedicated teams, and full-scale outsourcing.

2025.context: Globant S.A. is a digital transformation and technology services company focused on software development, digital experience, and AI transformation. Technology transformation leader. Competing with Accenture, EPAM.

competitors.notes: Enterprise-level alternative and top competitor. Specializes in digital engineering, cloud transformation, and AI-enabled services. Major player in the IT Services industry.
